Class VietnamDraftLottery

java.lang.Object
VietnamDraftLottery
public class VietnamDraftLottery extends Object
VietnamDraftLottery.java - Tells a user if they would've been drafted into Vietnam using their birthday.

Problem Statement: Prompts the user for their birthday, then compares that date to an array of Dates containing draft information populated by a text file.

Algorithm:
  1. Populate an Array of Date objects using populateDateArray().
  2. Print a header decribing the purpose of the program.
  3. Use a while until the user chooses to quit.
    4. In the loop:
    • Prompt for a Date to be searched for.
    • Use dateToIndex() to convert and store the date to an index in the array.
    • Print the toString() for the object at that index.
    • Use findClosestAlternate() to print the closest date that would've yeilded a different result.
    • Ask the user if they wish to continue.
  4. Print goodbye message to user.
Version:
Module 16, Final Project
Author:
Wes Parker

    • main

      public static void main(String[] arg)

    • populateDateArray

      public static Date[] populateDateArray(String inputFileName)
      Populates an array of Date objects using input from a file
      Parameters:
      inputFileName - a String object representing a file name to be used for input
      Returns:
      an array of Date objects which are assigned as DateDrafted or DateNotDrafted objects

    • dateToIndex

      public static int dateToIndex(String birthday, Date[] draftDates)
      Converts a date to an index in an array
      Parameters:
      birthday - a String object representing a date formatted as (MM/DD) or (MM-DD)
      draftDates - an array of Dates which contains the index we wish to return
      Returns:
      an index in the array of Dates for the date passed ex. 02/20 returns 50 because it's the 51st day of the year/index in the array
      Throws:
      InvalidDateException - dates which are not in the calandar year or in the format (MM/DD)

    • findClosestAlternate

      public static String findClosestAlternate(int currentDate, Date[] draftDates)
      Tells how far off the user was in days from an alternate outcome ex. if user wasn't drafted, this method will look for the closest date when the user would've been drafted
      Parameters:
      currentDate - an int which is the index of the date the user selected
      draftDates - an array of Dates to be searched for the nearest alternate outcome
      Returns:
      a String which tells the user how many days earlier/later they would've had to have been born to have been drafted or not drafted
